data.title: Non-Profit Organization of Italian Business Professionals
data.text:
A Swinging Success: The 2024 Columbian Foundation Annual Golf Outing!

The 2024 Columbian Foundation Annual Golf Outing at the picturesque Forest Hills Field Club was an outstanding success, filled with camaraderie and community spirit. We extend our heartfelt thanks to all our members, participants, and generous donors for their unwavering support and dedication to the Italian American community in New Jersey. Your continued efforts make events like these possible and strengthen our shared heritage.

A special thank you goes to the exceptional staff at the Forest Hills Field Club for their impeccable support and hospitality. Your commitment to ensuring a seamless and enjoyable event was truly appreciated.

Relive the highlights and memorable moments by exploring our photo gallery from the outing here. Thank you once again for being an integral part of our vibrant community.

View the photos from the event here

Download individual photos from the event on our photographer’s website here.

Save the Date!

The Columbian Foundation’s cordially invites you to join our Annual Christmas Party which is set for December 18th, 2023, at 6:30 PM.

Join us at “Nainina’s in the Park” in Belleville, New Jersey, for an evening of festive fun and camaraderie as we celebrate the holiday season. Tickets are $120 per person, and guests are encouraged and warmly welcomed!

Direct payments can be sent via checks made Payable to the Columbian Foundation and should be forwarded to Anthony Iuso at 190 Boulevard Pompton Plains, NJ 07444. Please Contact Mark Guarino at 973-216-7556 for payment by credit card. Please RSVP with names and preferred table seating to Dr. Guarino By December 11, 2023.

Email: Guarino.oxfordpharm@gmail.com Phone: 973-746-6657

Let’s make this holiday season unforgettable together as we celebrate our Italian American Community. See you there!

In the radiant ambiance of the Westmont Country Club, The Columbian Foundation celebrated its 81st Annual Gala, a night filled with gratitude, camaraderie, and a deep sense of community. It’s with immense appreciation that we extend our heartfelt thanks to all our members, attendees, and generous donors for their unwavering support, dedication, and tireless efforts within the vibrant Italian American community of New Jersey.

This gala was a special evening, where we not only celebrated our shared heritage but also recognized the incredible individuals who have made a significant impact on our community. Our 2023 Honorees have exemplified what it means to give back and support the Italian-American community in countless ways, and their contributions are nothing short of inspiring.

Furthermore, we take great pride in announcing the winners of the 2023 Scholarships, bright young minds who represent the future of our community. Their accomplishments and aspirations remind us of the enduring spirit of our heritage and the promising legacy that continues to thrive.

To relive the magic of this unforgettable evening, we invite you to peruse our photo gallery from the event, showcasing the smiles, laughter, and moments of connection that made the 81st Annual Gala an evening to remember.

View The Gala Photos Here

Thank you for being a part of our extended Columbian Foundation family. Your support is the lifeblood of our mission, and it’s through your dedication that we continue to build bridges, celebrate our heritage, and secure a brighter future for the Italian-American community in New Jersey.

In a heartwarming and gratuitous spirit, The Columbian Foundation gathered with the community once again to pay tribute to the heroes of 9/11. Against the backdrop of a crisp September evening, we came together to remember and honor those who served, as well as those who may have passed away since that fateful day.

As we raised the American flag high above the memorial site, our hearts swelled with gratitude for the service members who have dedicated their lives to protect our freedoms. This annual event serves as a poignant reminder of the sacrifices made by these brave men and women, and we are deeply thankful for their unwavering commitment to our nation.

With heavy hearts, we also remember those who are no longer with us. The heroes who ran toward danger, selflessly risking their lives to save others on that September day, will forever hold a special place in our hearts. Their courage and sacrifice will never be forgotten.

We invite you to take a moment to reflect on this solemn occasion by exploring our photo gallery from the event. Let these images serve as a testament to the unity, resilience, and gratitude that define our community as we come together to honor those who have given so much.

See the photos here

In honoring our past, we also look forward to a future filled with hope, unity, and the enduring spirit of service. Thank you to all who joined us on this meaningful day as we pay tribute to our heroes, past and present.
